attributes.action: Make English the official language of England
attributes.additional_details: English is not the official language of this country, the need for this has never arisen, until now. With the influx of foreign immigrants and the unstoppable flow of foreigners into this country with the blessing of the government. It would seem only right to make English the official language of this country before we get swamped by the use of a foreign language as the norm.

rejection.details: I beleive that this is already the case.
